channel.title: Help Needed
channel.description:
I also want to know how to make a command called ::switch with this you can switch from anceint to normal and from normal to anceints.
how do i change it so when you die you will be revived in a certain place?
How do i make a pk zone i got the pk box but i aint got the pk zone i have looked in the tut section but that say how to make a funkpk i tryed it but it didn't work i only want to the pk box so u can kill anyone at any lvl for e.g lvl 3 vs lvl 126 and when you go out of wildy your not in wildy.
I also need to fix this
[URL=http://img20.imageshack.us/my.php?image=adf.jpg][IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/3002/adf.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @RID22 RID22
item.description:
@RID22 wrote:

In player.java I think (Correct me if im wrong) you need to add or delete all of this code im bout to put it.

public int skulls = 0; public int hint = 0;

Wait… There’s more - REMEMBER YOU NEED TO ADD OR DELETE IDK WHICH!

playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hint); playerProps.writeByte(headIcon); // to find the above code, search playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

Read full topic

item.title: Help Needed

item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

} else if (command.startsWith("switch")) { ancients == 1; setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); } should work
